level.heading: Definition.
level.text: For the purposes of this subchapter, the term “derivative proceeding” means a civil action in the right of a domestic nonprofit corporation or, to the extent provided in § 29-411.08, in the right of a foreign nonprofit corporation.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under § 29-101.01.
